paper_abstract: This article reviews several test-chip designs that demonstrate the benefits of utilizing on-chip logic and a simple test interface to automate circuit aging experiments. This new class of compact on-chip sensors can reveal important aspects of circuit aging that would otherwise be impossible to measure, facilitate the collection of reliability data from systems in the field, and lead us to real-time aging compensation in future processors.
paper_title: SILICON ODOMETERS: COMPACT IN SITU AGING SENSORS FOR ROBUST SYSTEM DESIGN
